description: Architected and developed a comprehensive AI platform integrating Dify and N8N for academic research automation.
Built scalable microservices infrastructure using Next.js, TypeScript, and Docker to support AI agent workflows.
Implemented SSO authentication with Casdoor and designed admin dashboards for managing AI bot deployments.
Engineered 60+ reusable React.js components built on Syncfusion library, reducing development time by 40%.
Delivered 7 production-ready WordPress websites with custom Elementor designs for international clients.
Developed custom WordPress plugins extending core functionality for e-commerce and content management needs.
Built enterprise-grade IaaS management console using Next.js, TypeScript, and Chakra UI serving 1000+ active users.
Developed comprehensive admin panel with real-time monitoring, resource management, and billing integration.
Integrated custom Kubectl API for Kubernetes cluster management with intuitive React-based user interfaces.
Led cross-functional development team of 5 engineers delivering microservices-based web platform.
Architected and implemented React.js admin panel with real-time data visualization and user management.
Built company website using Next.js with headless WordPress CMS, improving page load times by 60%.
Established code review practices and CI/CD pipelines using Docker, reducing deployment errors by 80%.
Developed RESTful APIs using Node.js and MongoDB, handling 10K+ daily requests with 99.9% uptime.
Mentored frontend developers through code reviews and pair programming, improving code quality by 20%.
Led successful product launch from MVP to production, coordinating across engineering and product teams.
Built two Progressive Web Applications (PWA) using React.js and service workers, achieving 90+ Lighthouse scores.
Optimized Next.js company website, reducing bundle size by 45% and improving Core Web Vitals by 35%.
Delivered two production WordPress sites with custom themes and performance optimization for mobile-first experience.
Engineered full-stack application with Node.js REST API, MongoDB database, and Redis caching layer.
Built Progressive Web App and admin panel using React.js with Material UI and real-time data synchronization.
Developed cross-platform mobile application using React Native, deployed to Android with 50K+ downloads.
Created responsive company website using WordPress with custom post types and advanced custom fields.
Delivered 50+ custom websites for small businesses and startups, maintaining 98% client satisfaction rate.
Specialized in WordPress and Joomla development with custom themes, plugins, and SEO optimization.
Provided end-to-end web solutions including UI/UX design, responsive development, and cross-browser compatibility.
